short_summary: Request for Proposals for consultant services.
description: Repair of Jetty NC, CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia urn:epc:data-element/procurement-notice-short-description
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal
**Title**: Repair of Jetty NC, CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
**Reference Number**: PW-23-01029323
**Solicitation Number**: HX700402
**Publication Date**: March 7, 2023
**Closing Date**: May 18, 2023

### Invitation
The Department of National Defence, through Defence Construction Canada (DCC), invites qualified engineering consulting firms to participate in a Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) for the repair of the Jetty NC at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia.

### Description
The scope of work includes providing professional services for the repair of the Jetty NC, including the preparation of construction requirements and concept, site measurements, design development, and construction documents.

### Project Location
The project is located at the CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria outlined in the RFAP documents.

### Site Visit
A site visit will be offered on March 14, 2023, at 10:00 am local time. Registration for the site visit must be completed by March 11, 2023, at 10:00 am local time.

### Submittal
Qualified firms are invited to submit their Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date of May 18, 2023.

### Contact Information

* Francis Belanger, Procurement Officer
* Phone: [email address](mailto:Francis.Belanger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

### Important Details

* The current closing date has been modified from May 5, 2023, to May 18, 2023.
* The tender description is as per the RFAP documents.
* Proponents are advised to read the RFAP documents carefully before submitting their proposals.
* Questions and responses to the RFAP will be available on the DCC website.

### Security Requirements
The proponent must comply with the security requirements outlined in the RFAP documents.

### Contact
For further information, please contact Francis Belanger, Procurement Officer at Francis.Belanger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca. Deadline to submit proposal is May 18, 2023. 

---
